IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: CFS prepares a diverse group of boys with academic ability and good character to lead productive and fulfilling lives by making a college preparatory education financially accesible
IRS990.MissionDesc: The Church Farm School prepares a diverse group of boys with academic ability and good character to lead productive and fulfilling lives by making a college preparatory education financially accessible.
IRS990.Desc: Provision of a residential college preparatory environment for boys in grades 8 through 12 from financially deserving families. The school provides housing, some transportation, education, social activities, support services and a work program for approximately 200 boys on a 150 acre campus.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Schedule D, Part V, Line 4 CFS's Endowment consists of portfolio investments which provide approximately 70 percent of annual operating needs as well as long-term financial stability.

FORM 990, SCHEDULE D, PART X No provision for income taxes has been recorded in the accompanying financial statements due to CFS's exempt status. CFS follows the appropriate accounting guidance which prescribes a model for the recognition and measurement of a tax position taken or expected to be taken in a tax return, and provides guidance on recognition, classification, interest, and penalties, disclosure and transition. At June 30, 2016 these financial statements do not include any material tax positions.

SCHEDULE D, PART XI, LINE 2D DECREASE IN UNFUNDED PENSION STATUS $ 2,665,761 SCHEDULE D, PART XI, LINE 4B RECLASS OF SPECIAL EVENTS EXPENSE $ (92,794) Reconciliation of Expenses Schedule D, Part XII, Line 2D PENSION PLAN SETTLEMENT/CURTAILMENT $ 1,019,215 RECLASS OF SPECIAL EVENTS EXPENSE $ 92,794

Schedule E, Part I, Line 3 The policy as to nondiscrimination as to students is published in the parent/student handbook, the Philadelphia inquirer, the Philadelphia daily news and other local newspapers and journals of general circulation.

Schedule E, Part I, Line 6a Financial assistance is received from the state of Pennsylvania in the form of an allowance (credit) to be used for the rental of textbooks and other educational materials provided by the state to its public schools. Since the school is private, this provides the means for the school to provide available materials without the incurrence of significant expenditures.

Schedule J, Part I, Line 1 The School provides housing and other benefits to certain key employees as a requirement of their duties or as a benefit of employment. The value of these benefits are included in the taxable wages of these employees, to the extent they are not otherwise excluded from such by the Internal Revenue Code and all are disclosed, as required, on Form 990, Part VII and Schedule J.
Form 990, Part VI, Line 2 John Pickering and Mehul Trivedi have a business relationship.

Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b THE FORM 990 WAS PREPARED BY A NATIONALLY RECOGNIZED ACCOUNTING FIRM IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL DEPARTMENT. A COPY OF THE DRAFT FORM 990 WAS FIRST CIRCULATED TO THE FINANCE COMMITTEE AND THEN DISTRIBUTED TO THE FULL BOARD OF TRUSTEES FOR DISCUSSION AND COMMENT. EACH BOARD MEMBER WAS PROVIDED OPPORTUNITY TO COMMENT ON THE INFORMATION CONTAINED IN THE 990 PRIOR TO ITS FILING WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Conflict of Interest Policy Monitoring & Enforcement
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c Annually each officer, director, and key employee is required to respond to Management's "Activity Questionnaire".

Form 990, Part VI, Line 15A The executive committee of the board initially engaged an independent school compensation consultant to assist in designing and implementing the current compensation package/structure of the Head of School. The Executive Committee of the Board benchmarks the terms of compensation for the head of School to confirm policy is in-line with industry standards (National Association of Independent Schools/NAIS, etc.).

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: How Documents are Made Available to the Public
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19 The noted documents are provided upon request.
